div1.ab: Envoi d'une lettre de recommandation parvenu de la mission de la Columbia University
div1.p: Monsieur le Ministre et cher collègue, En reponse ci votre communication de 23 Mai, j'ai de vous adresser ci-inclus une lettre de recommandation ci Mr le Gouverneur General de l'Afrique Occidentale, en faveur de la mission scientifique par la Columbia University des Etats Unis.
Agreez Monsieur le Ministre et cher Collègue les assurances de ma haute consideration.

div1.ab: Sending a letter of recommendation transmitted from the mission of Columbia University
div1.p: Mr. Minister and dear colleague, In response to your communication from May 23rd, I to address to you enclosed a letter of recommendation here Mr. General Governor of West Africa, in favor of the scientific mission by Columbia University of the United States.
Accept Mr. Minister and dear colleague the assurances of my highest consideration.
